seo.name: GIFT PLAZA
seo.fullName: GIFT PLAZA – Digital Gift Card Store
seo.slogan: A store that brings joy to every celebration.
seo.description: Gift Plaza is a modern digital gift card platform built with Next.js and powerful web technologies. It offers a seamless gifting experience with beautifully designed categories for every occasion.

hero.subtitle: Send instant joy with personalized gift cards for birthdays, anniversaries, festivals, and more – all in one place at GiftPlaza.

categories.title: Shop by Category
categories.subtitle: Explore gift cards for every occasion
